actions.committee: Senate Committee Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to establish an arbitration board to settle disputes between supervisory organizations and the U.S. Postal Service.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Establishes an arbitration board to settle disputes between supervisory organizations and the United States Postal Service. States that the costs of the arbitration board shall be shared equally by the Postal Service and the organization of supervisory personnel.

titles.title: A bill to establish an arbitration board to settle disputes between supervisory organizations and the U.S. Postal Service.
